definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: :Job 22:16) foundation, base, abs. [[יְסוֹד]] Hb Hab 3:13 + 2 t.; cstr. id. Ex 29:12 + 9 t.; sf. [[יְסׂדוֹ]]; Ez Eze 13:14; [[יְסוֹדָם]] Job 4:19, Job 22:16; [[וִיסׂדֶיהָ]] Mic 1:6; [[יְסׂדׂתֶיהָ]] La 4:11; [[יְסוֹדוֹתֶיהָ]] Ez Eze 30:4; —

foundation of city (wall) Mic 1:6, Ps 137:7, cf. La 4:11; fig. of Egypt Ez Eze 30:4; [[שַׁעַר הַיְסוֹד]] 2Ch 23:5 one of gates of temple (but rd. [[סוּר]] ´[[שׁ]] 2Ki 11:6 or [[סוּס]] ´[[שׁ]] [rather [[הַסּוּסִים]] ´[[שׁ]]] Th Klo); fig. of men [[בֶּעָפָר]] ´[[יס]]; ‖[[שׁׂכְנֵי]] [[בָֽתֵּי חׂמֶר]] Job 4:19, cf. Job 22:16; of righteous Pr 10:25; of hostile prince under fig. of house Hb Hab 3:13 (details obscure, v:b prob. corrupt, v. We); of false prophecies under fig. of wall of defence Ez Eze 13:14.
base, bottom, of altar Ex 29:12, Le 4:7, Le 4:18, Le 4:25, Le 4:30, Le 4:34, Le 5:9, Le 8:15, Le 9:9 (all P).
